CustomField.description: Should start with 'cash' for cash, 'ck' for check, 'of' for official check, or 'mt' for Western Union. All other codes should be used for wire transfers with different numbering conventions depending on the bank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Should start with 'cash' for cash, 'ck' for check, 'of' for official check, or 'mt' for Western Union. All other codes should be used for wire transfers with different numbering conventions depending on the bank.
CustomField.label: Payment ref
